column4: The "highlighted in red" part is from grep; it's telling you what part of the input it matched.
OK.  But this result ultimately means then that "libpackage2.so" is the original file, nothing has changed, and it's not a virus?
I'm not familiar with debsums, or the procedure that thune3 was describing.  I was just helping out with the bit I did know.
The questions you're asking are answered many millions of times over on Google.  Please.
